title.rendered: Samsung Original 25W Fast Charging USB-C Mobile Phone Mains Plug/Wall Charger, Genuine Charger Compatible with Galaxy…

content.rendered:
Samsung Original 25W Fast Charging USB-C Mobile Phone Mains Plug/Wall Charger, Genuine Samsung Charger Compatible with Galaxy Smartphones and Other USB Type C Devices – White, EP-TA800XWEGGB

Make positive this matches by getting into your mannequin quantity.
Samsung USB-C quick charger: Super quick charging of as much as 25W of suitable cell phones and USB Type C units
USB-C cable included: This mains wall charger comes with a removable Samsung USB-C to USB-C cable, permitting you to cost from different sources, comparable to a laptop computer or energy financial institution
Adaptive fast-charging: The moveable 25W adaptive quick charger can improve charging energy to satisfy your gadget’s wants and is suitable with most USB-C units and smartphones
Compact design: The Samsung Galaxy telephone charger is compact and light-weight, making it the perfect moveable charger for travelling and commuting
Official Samsung product: This is a real Samsung quick charging wall charger and comes with a 1 yr guarantee
